attributes.title: Silence Within || Part 4 || Shiva Sutras || 25 May 2007
attributes.description:
TITLE: Silence Within Part 4
Name Of The Convention: Shiva Sutras
Session on: Based on technique from Shiva Sutra given by Mahadeva to Devi on how to center within sound
Venue: Seattle, WA, USA
Date: 25 May 2007

Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Jagatguru Mahasannidhanam His Divine Holiness Bhagavan #Nithyananda Paramashivam explains that if we allow sounds or words to go through us and disappear within ourselves, then we are egoless person. Nothing can shake us. When we cannot allow words to go thru and we bounce words(sound) back on others, then that forms karma chakra. We can use this as Meditation Technique. Not stopping the words coming towards us in our life and not give meaning to it. Use words to center inside and allow the words to flow thru us without resisting. This will surely provide path to liberation. We should use every situation in life as an opportunity to liberate. If we are hurt by master’s words, then we are standing with a big ego. Even Life is a great master. We should allow words to pass through us without we getting hurt. Then life can be a great master giving liberation.
Part 1- https://youtu.be/4H0sa9m9EpA
Part 2- https://youtu.be/Id8EqNKoOKI
Part 3- https://youtu.be/i2M7V_1_s7s

The Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism Jagatguru Mahasannidhanam His Divine Holiness Nithyananda Paramashivam (HDH) is the reviver of KAILASA - the ancient enlightened civilization and the great cosmic borderless Hindu nation. Revered as the incarnation of Paramashiva - the primordial Hindu Divinity, HDH has a following of 2 billion Hindus worldwide with de facto spiritual embassies in over 150 countries. He has worked untiringly for over 26 years for the revival of Kailasa, for global peace and to give super conscious breakthrough to humanity. He has survived the worst persecution of multiple assassination attempts on person and on character by anti-Hindu elements. He is collecting, organising, preserving, time capsuling, decoding, spreading and reviving 20 Million source books of Hinduism and the 64 sacred arts & sciences like Ayurveda, music, dance, sculpting, astrology, vastu and much more. Close to 20,000 hours of HDH’s timeless talks have been recorded till date (Sep 2020), which are a treasure trove of powerful cognitions to solve individual and global problems of any kind.
